metadata.title: CVE-2021-39902 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect Authorization in GitLab CE/EE 13.4 or above allows a user withguest membership in a project to modify the severity of an incident.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
